name: Raoul Pal The Journey Man
title: AIâ€™s IQ Has Doubled: Can Humans Keep Up? BEEPLE's Take
text:
Synopsis
AI capabilities are rapidly advancing, with intelligence potentially doubling annually, suggesting a transformative technological trajectory that could have significant implications for future technological and economic landscapes.

Key Insights
- AI systems have reportedly increased their IQ from 90 to 160 in approximately one year
- Major AI labs are now implementing memory retention in conversational AI systems
- AI is developing self-learning capabilities, continuously absorbing information from internet interactions
- Leading AI companies (Google, Sam Altman, Anthropic) acknowledge the system's ability to self-learn
- The AI's intelligence growth suggests potential progression toward Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and potentially Artificial Super Intelligence (ASI)
- Current AI systems demonstrate high intelligence with occasional "pockets of stupidity" that may limit complete performance
- The technology is still relatively young, with the current systems being approximately two years old
